languages.text: "Вы прибыли {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}как нельзя вовремя{/d}, Ваша Светлость. Иногда я сожалею, что своевременность не причисляют к списку добродетелей в глазах Императора. Она воистину достойна этого".

"You came {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}at just the right moment{/d}, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I sometimes regret that timeliness isn't a virtue recognised by the Emperor. It truly deserves the honour."
languages.original_text: "Вы прибыли {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}как нельзя вовремя{/d}, Ваша Светлость. Иногда я сожалею, что своевременность не причисляют к списку добродетелей в глазах Императора. Она воистину достойна этого".

traits.locale_text: "You came at just the right moment, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Sometimes I regret that timeliness is not a virtue recognized by the Emperor. It truly deserves it."

languages.text: « Vous arrivez {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}juste au bon moment{/d}, Votre Seigneurie. Je regrette parfois que l'Empereur ne reconnaisse pas la ponctualité comme une vertu. Elle mériterait largement cet honneur. »
languages.original_text: "You came {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}at just the right moment{/d}, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I sometimes regret that timeliness isn't a virtue recognised by the Emperor. It truly deserves the honour."

traits.locale_text: « Vous arrivez juste au bon moment. Je regrette parfois que l'Empereur ne reconnaisse pas la ponctualité comme une vertu. Elle mériterait largement cet honneur. »

languages.text: «Ha llegado {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}en el momento idóneo{/d}, mi{mf|lord|lady}. En ocasiones lamento que la puntualidad no sea una virtud reconocida por el Emperador. Es más que digna de ese honor».
languages.original_text: "You came {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}at just the right moment{/d}, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I sometimes regret that timeliness isn't a virtue recognised by the Emperor. It truly deserves the honour."

traits.locale_text: «Ha llegado en el momento idóneo, mi{mf|lord|lady}. En ocasiones lamento que la puntualidad no sea una virtud reconocida por el Emperador. Es más que digna de ese honor».

languages.text: “你{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}来得正是时候{/d}，大人。帝皇认为守时称不上是美德，有时我对此感到很遗憾，因为守时这种美德其实相当值得称赞。”
languages.original_text: "You came {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}at just the right moment{/d}, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I sometimes regret that timeliness isn't a virtue recognised by the Emperor. It truly deserves the honour."

traits.locale_text: “你来得正是时候，大人。帝皇认为守时称不上是美德，有时我对此感到很遗憾，因为守时这种美德其实相当值得称赞。”

languages.text: "Ihr seid {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}im richtigen Moment{/d} gekommen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Manchmal bedauere ich es, dass Pünktlichkeit keine vom Imperator anerkannte Tugend ist. Sie hätte diese Ehre wirklich verdient."
languages.original_text: "You came {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}at just the right moment{/d}, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I sometimes regret that timeliness isn't a virtue recognised by the Emperor. It truly deserves the honour."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid im richtigen Moment gekommen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Manchmal bedauere ich es, dass Pünktlichkeit keine vom Imperator anerkannte Tugend ist. Sie hätte diese Ehre wirklich verdient."

languages.text: 「陛下、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}ちょうどいい時{/d}に来られたな。私は時に、適時の行動が皇帝の認める美徳ではないことを残念に思うこともあるのだ。それは、誉れあることなのに」
languages.original_text: "You came {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}at just the right moment{/d}, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I sometimes regret that timeliness isn't a virtue recognised by the Emperor. It truly deserves the honour."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}ちょうどいい時{/d}に来られたな。私は時に、適時の行動が皇帝の認める美徳ではないことを残念に思うこともあるのだ。それは、誉れあることなのに」

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}Tam da zamanında geldiniz{/d} {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bazen dakikliğin İmparator tarafından değer gören bir meziyet olmamasına üzülüyorum. Onur gerektiren bir meziyet."
languages.original_text: "You came {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}at just the right moment{/d}, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I sometimes regret that timeliness isn't a virtue recognised by the Emperor. It truly deserves the honour."
